share_info.tips: #深蓝L06入门满配预售价13.99万#的相关内容，来智搜看看

response.share_text: #深蓝L06入门满配预售价13.99万#的相关内容，来智搜看看
response.msg:
嗯，用户让我分析关于深蓝L06的预售价和配置信息。首先，我需要仔细梳理搜索结果中的关键点。用户提供的搜索结果很多，有70多个，其中大部分是微博内容，发布时间集中在2025年10月30日和31日，时效性很强。

首先，预售价方面，多个结果提到入门版是13.99万，比如结果27、42、45等详细列出了四个版本的预售价，从13.99万到16.19万不等。这里需要确认不同版本的区别，特别是Ultra和Ultra+的主要差异，比如磁流变悬架是否标配还是选装。结果3、12提到特别版（即Ultra+）直接搭载磁流变悬架，而入门版可以选装，但结果49提到预售期间免选装费，这点很重要，需要强调。

接下来是核心配置。全系标配激光雷达和3nm芯片在多个结果中被反复提及，如结果1、11、17，说明智驾和车机性能是宣传重点。宁德时代电池和670km续航也是高频信息，结果1、15、50都提到续航能力，用户可能关心续航的真实性，但搜索结果中没有质疑，可以放心引用。

磁流变悬架作为重要卖点，结果25、35、60详细对比了和特斯拉的测试视频，强调操控性和舒适性。这里需要引用具体测试数据，如麋鹿测试85.6km/h，以及对比特斯拉的优势，增强说服力。

预售权益方面，结果49、66提到赠送大疆Pocket3和终身质保，结果68提到刘浩存订购顶配，明星效应可能影响用户购买决策，但需注意引用认证账号的信息更可靠。

用户潜在需求方面，结果2、9、40从家庭出行和旅行角度描述使用场景，突出空间和舒适性，如零重力座椅和半隐藏门把手。这部分可以合并到亮点中，满足不同用户群体的关注点。

最后，科技平权的概念在结果6、17、62中被强调，说明深蓝试图打破高端配置垄断，这对价格敏感的用户很有吸引力。需要整合这些观点，突出性价比。

需要验证是否有冲突信息，比如结果27的版本命名与其他结果一致，结果46的图片显示价格相同，可确认数据准确。同时，注意引用优质搜索结果（带标记的），如结果1、2、3等，提高可信度。

总结时需分核心卖点、版本差异、预售政策，确保信息全面且引用正确来源。避免遗漏关键点如3C快充、终身质保，这些是用户决策的重要因素。

深蓝L06作为2025年新能源市场的重磅车型，以“入门即满配”理念和13.99万元起的预售价引发广泛关注。核心信息整理如下：
### **一、核心亮点与配置**
1. **全系标配硬核技术**
- **智驾系统**：全系标配激光雷达 + DEEPAL AD Max端到端算法（与特斯拉FSD同源），支持高速/城区领航辅助、自动泊车，复杂路况响应精准。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 5, "data": {"num": [1, 11, 17], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "路飞科技说", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227566005748410", "index": 17, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "新浪新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227552911133070", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "资深科技控", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227555952525764", "index": 11, "label": ""}], "name": "路飞科技说", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.996.996.50/454c5191ly8gdvjnaffg1j20ro0rotb8.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761931158&ssig=wx0q3VWHvA", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227566005748410", "vType": 0}}```
- **3nm座舱芯片**：全球首搭天玑S1 Ultra车规级芯片，车机流畅度媲美苹果手机，安兔兔跑分163万（行业第一）。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 6, "data": {"num": [21, 46, 55], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "宅数码Kael", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227561479045393", "index": 21, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "科技Daily", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227559799229134", "index": 46, "label": ""}, {"name": "数码小哥哥", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227734160638150", "index": 55, "label": ""}], "name": "宅数码Kael", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.996.996.50/005WFjPWly8gdi7dn8wtyj30ro0ro3zj.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761931158&ssig=tfNx2HRC1Z", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227561479045393", "vType": 0}}```
- **续航与电池**：全系宁德时代电芯 + 金钟罩电池，纯电版CLTC续航最高670km，支持3C超充（15分钟补能330km），零自燃记录。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 7, "data": {"num": [1, 26, 50], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "楼斌Robin", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227562990310926", "index": 50, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "新浪新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227552911133070", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "深蓝汽车", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227794508552653", "index": 26, "label": ""}], "name": "楼斌Robin", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/a7c1c366ly8hpklxgpnrxj20u00u0wfr.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761931158&ssig=0hTNsgied5", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227562990310926", "vType": 0}}```

2. **越级驾控体验**
- **磁流变悬架**：采用300万级法拉利296GTB同款技术（Ultra+版标配，其他版限时免选装费），10毫秒响应速度，麋鹿测试85.6km/h（超保时捷911），过坎稳、过弯无侧倾，被称“公路磁悬浮”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 9, "data": {"num": [25, 35, 60, 76], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "牛丸科技", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227549007545509", "index": 25, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "类星频道", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227559683887030", "index": 35, "label": ""}, {"name": "小朱观地球", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227566107723648", "index": 60, "label": ""}, {"name": "高奔GoBig", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227558456264509", "index": 76, "label": ""}], "name": "牛丸科技", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/77546895ly8hhyk5apj4zj20u00u00uh.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761931157&ssig=AHcZ4K9DQk", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227549007545509", "vType": 0}}```
- **性能参数**：5.9秒零百加速，5%低电量下性能不衰减。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 10, "data": {"num": [52], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "机智小恩恩", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227548048886016", "index": 52, "label": "大v"}], "name": "机智小恩恩", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/006ZzoEEly8i1pfahhy4mj30u00u0tcb.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761931158&ssig=IPWt2C3NXm", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227548048886016", "vType": 0}}```

3. **舒适与细节设计**
- **零重力座椅**：缓解长途疲劳，前排通风/加热/记忆。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 12, "data": {"num": [2, 9], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "程诗然", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227567013429996", "index": 2, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "Anry-Young", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227566509332019", "index": 9, "label": ""}], "name": "程诗然", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.888.888.50/54176374ly8fso803zcbyj20oo0oot9p.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761931158&ssig=2T91JQNVwk", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227567013429996", "vType": 0}}```
- **半隐藏门把手**：兼顾颜值与防冻实用性。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 13, "data": {"num": [7, 12], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "后浪青年钱安利", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227563993794924", "index": 7, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "真真Lucia", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227564999380341", "index": 12, "label": ""}], "name": "后浪青年钱安利", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/003NuYilly8i3a3h078s5j60u00u0q6e02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761931158&ssig=bnM2NQ4xG1", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227563993794924", "vType": 0}}```
- **空间优化**：2900mm轴距，溜背造型兼顾后排空间，后备箱可拓展至1200L。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 14, "data": {"num": [55, 65], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "数码小哥哥", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227734160638150", "index": 55, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "桔猪", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227573055591138", "index": 65, "label": ""}], "name": "数码小哥哥", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.512.512.50/92ac8001ly8hb5020e0yzj20e80e80t2.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761931158&ssig=fplDkZNMcE", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227734160638150", "vType": 0}}```
新浪新闻
科技Daily
牛丸科技
深蓝汽车

### **二、版本与预售价**
| **版本** | **预售价** | **核心差异** |
|-------------------|------------|---------------------------------------|
| 560 Ultra激光版 | 13.99万 | 基础满配（激光雷达/3nm芯片/670km续航） |
| 670 Ultra激光版 | 14.99万 | 续航升级 |
| 560 Ultra+激光版 | 15.19万 | 增加磁流变悬架 |
| 670 Ultra+激光版 | 16.19万 | 顶配（磁流变悬架+续航升级） |


> 注：增程版后续推出，纯电续航180km。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 17, "data": {"num": [67, 73], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "毒家说", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227559621233320", "index": 67, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "大家车言论", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227548789182388", "index": 73, "label": ""}], "name": "毒家说", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.512.512.50/a1977d45ly8ga5d6volmqj20e80e8dfy.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761931158&ssig=1iLGryTT7C", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227559621233320", "vType": 0}}```
### **三、预售权益**
- **限时福利**：
- 999元抵3999元购车款（膨胀金）；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 21, "data": {"num": [42, 49], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "梁小欣同学", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227546259492916", "index": 49, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "深蓝汽车", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227544267722361", "index": 42, "label": ""}], "name": "梁小欣同学", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.512.512.50/e0850594ly8hpn4hor0azj20e80e80ta.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761931158&ssig=DHo9VEqn4o", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227546259492916", "vType": 0}}```
- 赠大疆Pocket 3运动相机；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 22, "data": {"num": [13, 54], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "毒舌数码", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227546700416843", "index": 54, "label": ""}, {"name": "爱车的Ray", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227560477655767", "index": 13, "label": ""}], "name": "毒舌数码", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/5d307b27ly8gc2u3wq93vj20u00u0q4l.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761931158&ssig=PlK%2BfbV5%2BK", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227546700416843", "vType": 0}}```
- 12月31日前锁单送磁流变悬架终身质保。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 23, "data": {"num": [49, 73], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "大家车言论", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227548789182388", "index": 73, "label": ""}, {"name": "梁小欣同学", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227546259492916", "index": 49, "label": ""}], "name": "大家车言论", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.512.512.50/006GDWgely8gdi5wdnvw2j30e80e80st.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761931158&ssig=Oha0yOXt0e", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227548789182388", "vType": 0}}```
- **其他权益**：置换补贴最高5000元，购置税兜底政策。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 24, "data": {"num": [69], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "春卷", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227715978594561", "index": 69, "label": ""}], "name": "春卷", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.996.996.50/624bf73fly8g5de3vr5ntj20ro0rodgr.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761931158&ssig=jU5CFZ7dZA", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227715978594561", "vType": 0}}```
深蓝汽车

### **四、市场定位与用户反馈**
- **科技平权**：将百万豪车技术下放至15万级，重新定义性价比标杆。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 27, "data": {"num": [6, 17, 62], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "OK陈与陈", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227564998329219", "index": 6, "label": ""}, {"name": "路飞科技说", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227566005748410", "index": 17, "label": ""}, {"name": "长安少侠TOK", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227563989340200", "index": 62, "label": ""}], "name": "OK陈与陈", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.690.690.50/005PzX4Vly8hg4ibu5dy6j30j60j6jsf.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761931158&ssig=4IwnHoqPih", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227564998329219", "vType": 0}}```
- **场景适配**：家庭出行（宽敞空间/防晕车悬架）、自驾旅行（长续航/智驾应对复杂路况）、城市通勤（拥堵辅助/快充）。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 28, "data": {"num": [2, 40, 43], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "米娅Miaaaaaa", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227568523382341", "index": 40, "label": ""}, {"name": "程诗然", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227567013429996", "index": 2, "label": ""}, {"name": "梁一鸣Max", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227561978171101", "index": 43, "label": ""}], "name": "米娅Miaaaaaa", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/defe2584ly8hdfjik6lcaj20u00u0af2.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761931157&ssig=169gjaz1bG", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227568523382341", "vType": 0}}```
- **明星效应**：品牌大使刘浩存已订购顶配版，助推年轻群体关注。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 29, "data": {"num": [68, 69], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "Xauto报告", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227859020876243", "index": 68, "label": ""}, {"name": "春卷", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227715978594561", "index": 69, "label": ""}], "name": "Xauto报告", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/008utJnLly8hfag8gbf91j30u00u0wex.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761931158&ssig=L4RO%2FuCYr9", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227859020876243", "vType": 0}}```

深蓝L06通过“驾控+智能+续航”三位一体的全能表现，以13.99万起的价格冲击主流市场，预售表现被业内视为“2025年爆款黑马”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 30, "data": {"num": [15, 52, 67], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "李勇岐", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227558959844094", "index": 15, "label": ""}, {"name": "机智小恩恩", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227548048886016", "index": 52, "label": ""}, {"name": "毒家说", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227559621233320", "index": 67, "label": ""}], "name": "李勇岐", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1242.1242.50/4e07dcf1ly8fubjtuuu6jj20yi0yigmf.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761931158&ssig=20vHNo7XbU", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227558959844094", "vType": 0}}```
米娅Miaaaaaa
